name: Aerial
overview: Aerial is part of a series of games by Japanese developer Inufuto, who builds a single game design and then ports it to a very wide variety of retro hardware. Aerial is a side-scrolling shooter, in which the player pilots a plane viewed from the side-scrolling left to right. The joystick is used to pitch the plane up or down, and fire button to fire. The objective is to avoid planes/rockets being launched at the player, and shoot down planes or ground targets when possible. Powerups will also appear that are used by flying over them.
